en_text: This correspondence has just arrived.
jp_text: こちらの書簡が届いております
google_translated: This letter has arrived

en_text: Gakai, I find myself a bit exhausted...
jp_text: ガカイよ 余は少し疲れた
google_translated: Gakai I'm a little tired

en_text: You have taught me a great many things.
jp_text: そなたは 余に さまざまなことを教えてくれたな
google_translated: He taught me a lot of things

en_text: I am grateful to you.
jp_text: 感謝しておるぞ
google_translated: Thank you

en_text: You are too kind, Your Highness.
jp_text: もったいない お言葉でございます
google_translated: It is a good word

en_text: From now on, I want you to cooperate with Shuga as a star reader...
jp_text: これからは 星読みとしてシュガと協調し―
google_translated: From now on, we cooperate with Suga as a star reading-

en_text: ...and make the palace a better place.
jp_text: この宮を よりよきものにしてくれ
google_translated: Make this palace better

en_text: Will you release that bird into the sky?
jp_text: あの鳥を 空に放してやってはくれぬか？
google_translated: Do you want to release that bird sky?

en_text: Yes. I can no longer give it the attention it deserves.
jp_text: ああ 余も そうそう面倒を見ておれんのでな
google_translated: Oh, I'm looking forward to seeing you too much

en_text: Indeed. Considering all your duties as crown prince, perhaps it is time.
jp_text: 確かに 皇太子の職務を考えますと 頃合いかもしれませんな
google_translated: Certainly it may be a time to think about the job of the prince

en_text: Go on! Fly, I say!
jp_text: それ 行けというのじゃ それ！ それ！
google_translated: That's right!That!

en_text: It is flying strongly, Your Highness.
jp_text: おお うまく飛ぶものですな
google_translated: It's something flying well

en_text: Surely the result of the tender care you lavished upon it.
jp_text: これも 殿下の手厚い施しの たまものでしょうな
google_translated: This is also a talled hand-made

en_text: Forgive me, Chagum...
jp_text: 許せ チャグム
google_translated: Forgive chagrm
